markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=2041)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 254 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Apollyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=390), [Baalzebul](/Deities.aspx?ID=394), [Ghlaunder](/Deities.aspx?ID=343), [Kitumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=677), [Selket](/Deities.aspx?ID=640), [Xsistaid](/Deities.aspx?ID=423)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You belch forth a swarm of magical vermin. You evoke and shape the creatures from your own imagination, allowing you to change the appearance of the creatures (typically a mix of centipedes, roaches, wasps, and worms), but this doesn't change the effect of the spell. The vermin swarm over anyone in the area, their bites and stings dealing 2d8 piercing damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails its saving throw also becomes sickened 1. Once the spell ends, the swarm disappears.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Vomit Swarm

<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
</traits>

<additional-info>

</row>

---

<summary>
Vermin erupt in a cone from your mouth.
</summary>
summary: Vermin erupt in a cone from your mouth.

You evoke and shape the creatures from your own imagination, allowing you to change the appearance of the creatures (typically a mix of centipedes, roaches, wasps, and worms), but this doesn't change the effect of the spell. The vermin swarm over anyone in the area, their bites and stings dealing 2d8 piercing damage (basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its saving throw also becomes sickened 1. Once the spell ends, the swarm disappears. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.
